message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.IR 

This paper is about improving the robustness of named entity recognition models to capitalization errors. Therefore, it is most likely to belong to the arXiv category of Computation and Language (cs.CL). The paper proposes a data augmentation approach to improve the model's performance, which involves training the model on noisy text data. This suggests that the paper could also belong to the categories of Machine Learning (cs.LG) and Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI). Additionally, the paper involves training models on different languages and dataset sizes, which could make it relevant to the Natural Language Processing (cs.NE) and Information Retrieval (cs.IR) categories.
